instruction: Compose and belay a tweet about the film "Titanic".
output: Wow! #Titanic has been dominating the big screen for 24 years – and it's still as epic as ever! This classic romance and drama has conquered the hearts of moviegoers since its debut in 1997. Who else can't wait to bask in the classic cinema of #Titanic? 🚢 🌟 💕
